src:
Klopka za Patriote u Baltimoru, Denver bez startnog kvoterbeka, Mahoms i dalje aut
Nju Ingland će imati najteži ispit ove sezone protiv trkačke mašine Rejvensa. Džoe Flako pauziraće pet do šest nedelja. MVP prošle sezone propustiće i drugi meč zbog povrede kolena. Grin Bej će se osećati kao kod kuće u Los Anđelesu

03 Nov 2019

Može li neko da zaustavi mašineriju Bila Beličika? Nju Ingland je u sjajnoj formi, mnogi stručnjaci u SAD prognoziraju savršenu sezonu bez poraza Patriota. Odbrana je dovedena do savršenstva, prima samo 7,5 poena u proseku po utakmici, a napad sa Tomom Brejdijem nikada nije bio sporan. Crno se piše Baltimoru, ali...
Neće biti lako timu iz Bostona koga očekuje najteži ispit u ovom NFL šampinatu u udarnom terminu „preko bare“ (ponedeljak, 02.20). Rejvensi igraju potpuno drugačije od drugih timova. Statistički, radi se o najboljem napadu trčanjem. Preko 200 jardi po utakmici ima četa Džona Harboua. Ne preti opasnost po branioca titule samo od raning bekova, gde dominira Mark Ingram, pojačanje iz Nju Orleansa, nego i od pokretnog, fantastičnog mladog kvoterbeka Lamara Džeksona. Baltimor je vezao tri pobede, slavio je i na teškom gostovanju u Sijetlu, pa čini se da ove sezone plej-of ne može da pobegne dvostrukim Superboul šampionima.
Ako iko može da pročita protivnički napad onda je do trenerski mag Bil Beličik, koji je ove sezone i defanzivni koordinator svog tima. Odbrana sa Donteom Hajtauerom, Kajl van Nojom i Džejmijem Kolinsom izgleda brutalno i nema sumnje da Džeksona čeka paklen posao da izbegne „sekove“ snažnih i pokretnih lajnbekera gostiju.
Protekle nedelje Nju Ingland je rešio da se odrekne Džoša „Fleša“ Gordona, koji je završio u Sijetlu. Ipak, dobr stvar po Patrote da će prvi put u sezoni ativan da bude ovogodišnji pik prve runde, visoki risver N’Kil Heri. On bi trebalo da pomogne hvatačkom korpusu gde su Džulijan Edelman, Filip Dorset i novajlija iz Atlante Mohamed Sanu. Šampion je favorit. Ne očekuje se gaženje Rejvensa, ali će teško domaćin da stane na puz nezadrživom timu iz Masačustesa.
Takođe, za meč u Baltimoru Nju Ingland ima novog kikera. Umesto otpuštenom Majka Nudženta šansu je dobio Nik Folk. On će narednih nedelja menjati povređenog startnog šutera Stivena Gostkovskog.



Kvoterbek Kanzasa Patrik Mahoms je propustio poslednji duel sa Grin Bejom. Četa Endija Rida se dobro držala na Erouhedu, ali je u finišu poklekla pred naletima magičnog Erona Rodžersa i sve boljih Pekersa. Iako je postojala šansa da se prošlosezonski MVP vrati za duel sa Minesotom, poslednje informacije kažu da će ipak da sačeka sa povratkom posle povrede kolena. Opet će u vatru morati veteran Met Mur. Neigranje Mahomsa mogla bi da iskoristi Minesota koja je u naletu, vezala je četiri trijumfa. Kirk Kazins konačno opravdava basnoslovni ugovor od 28 miliona dolara po sezoni. U tim iz Mineapolisa mogao bi da se vrati i risiver Adam Tilen, koji je propustio prošli meč protiv Vašingtona zvog povrede zadnje lože. Igra trčanjem funkcioniše za goste, odličan je Dalvin Kuk, a odbrana Čifsa nije na nivou ove sezone.
Denver već može da se okrene narednoj sezoni. Posle skora 2-6 šanse za plej-of su svedene na minimum. Uz to, startni kvoterbek Džoe Flako, ovosezonsko pojačanje iz Baltimora, povredio se i odsustovaće pet do šest nedelja i verovatno je i završio ovaj šampionat. Bronkosi na svom terenu čekaju očajni Klivlend. Od Braunsa se mnogo očekivalo, ali su izgoreli u želji. Kvoterbek Bejker Mejfild, prvi pik na draftu prošle godine, na udaru je kritika. Čak je prošle nedelje i napustio konferenciju za medije posle rafalne paljbe novinara. Odel Bekam nije opravdao poverenje tima iz Ohaja, a čini se da ni glavni trener Fredi Kičens nije dorastao zadatku vođenja tima koji stremi ka plej-ofu.
Jedan od derbija igra se u Los Anđelesu gde slabi Čardžersi čekaju razigrani Grin Bej. Eron Rodžers je ušao u top formu, a dobra stvar za goste iz Viskonsina je što se posle više od mesec dana zbog povrede prsta u tim vraća prvi risiver Devonte Adams, omiljena meta fantastičnog kvoterbeka.
Pekersi će u Gradu anđela da se osećaju kao kao kuće. Na najmanjem stadionu u ligi u Karsonu, kapaciteta samo 27.000 mesta, bar polovina će biti na strani Grin Beja, jedne od najpopularnijih franšiza lige. Filip Rivers ima očajnu protekciju ove sezone. Čardžersi kubure sa povredama i teško će da zaustave Grin Bej, koji je u neletu sa novim, mladim stručnjakom Metom Laflerom. Čardžersi su protekle nedelje smenili ofanzivnog koordinarora.
Sijetl je neporažen ove sezone u gostima, ali je već dva puta kiksnuo na nekada teško osvojivom Senčuri Link fildu. Kvoterek Rasel Vilson igra odlično, jedan je od kandidata za MVP lige. Tampa Bej uma da „zabiberi čorbu“ favoritima, ali čini se da će teško da slave protiv Sihoksa. Pojačanje iz Patriota Džoš Gordon neće igrati za Sihokse. Kontroverzni risiver poznat po neverovatnom talentu, ali i problemima sa zakonom, opijatima i depresijom, sačekaće na debi za nove ekipu.



Nedeljni program otvaraju na londonskom Vembliju divizijski rivali sa juga AFC-a Džeksonvil i Hjuston. Oba tima jure plej-of. Teksansi će biti oslabljeni neigranjem vođe odbrane Dže Džej Vota koji je operisan protekle nedelje i završio je sezonu. Biće to veliki hendikep za Hjuston, koji igra po principu toplo-hladno. Kvoterbek Dešon Votson je prošle nedelje protiv Ouklenda dobio udarac u oko. Igraće u britanskoj prestonici, ali videćemo da li će mu to smetati da pokaže maksimum.
Indijanapolis će u Pitsburgu da bude lišen usluga prvog risivera Ti Vaj Hiltona, koga očekuje tri do četiri nedelje pauze. Stilersi hvataju poslednji voz za doigravanje. Pobeda im je imperativ, a uzdaju se u odličnu odbranu koja je bolji deo tima posle povrede kvoterbeka Bena Rotlisbergera. Mejson Rudolf će voditi svoj tim na Hanjc fildu protiv takođe dobre defanzive Koltsa. Ne očekuje se mnogo poena u ovom meču.
Filadelfija nikako da veže seriju pobeda. Posle trijumfa u Bafalu u Pensilvaniju stižu ranjeni Čikago, koji će teško će ponovi prošlosezonski uspeh i plasman u pelj-of. Gosti će imati veliki motiv da se osvete Filadelfiji za poraz u „vajl kard“ rundi kada je nesrećni kiker Kodi Parki pogodio stativu u poslednjoj sekundi meča i zaledio Soldžer fild. Konačno bi u Superboul šampionu iz 2018. godine trebalo da se vrati iskusni risiver Dešon Džekson, koga nema još od prvog meča sezona kada se povredio u duelu sa Vašingtonom.
Karolina i Tenesi igraju meč koji bi mogao da odluči o nastavku snova o doigravanju. Za Panterse i dalje nema kvoterbeka Kema Njutona, ali u Šarlotu mnogo ne tuguje za Super Kemom pošto njegova zamena Kajl Alen igrao odlično. I tim iz Nešvila je proigrao kada je zamenio kvoterbeka i umesto neubedljivog Markusa Mariote šansu pružio Rajanu Tanehilu.
Za Vašongton će u Bafalu prvi put starter da bude mladi ruki kvoterbek Dvejn Heskins koji menja iskusnog Kejsija Kinuma.

text:
Patriots trap in Baltimore, Denver without starting quarterback, Mahoms still out
New England will have the toughest exam of the season against the Ravens race car. Joe Flaco will pause for five to six weeks. The MVP last season will miss the second match due to a knee injury. Green Bay will make you feel at home in Los Angeles

03 Nov 2019

Can anyone stop Bill Belichika's machinery? New England is in great shape, with many experts in the US predicting a perfect season without defeating the Patriots. The defense was perfected, receiving only 7.5 points on average per game, and the attack with Tom Brady was never in dispute. Black is spelled Baltimore, but ...
It's not going to be easy for a Boston team expecting the toughest exam in this NFL championship at the stroke of "across the bar" (Monday, 2:20 p.m.). The Ravens play completely differently than other teams. Statistically, this is the best running attack. Over 200 yards per game has John Harbo's company. Not only does he threaten the defending champion of the rankings, dominated by Mark Ingram, a New Orleans quarterback, but also by the moving, fantastic young quarterback Lamar Jackson. Baltimore tied for three wins, celebrated with a tough visit to Seattle, so it seems like this season's playoffs can't escape the double Superboul champions.
If anyone can read the opposing offense then it's up to coaching magistrate Bill Belichik, who is also his team's defensive coordinator this season. The defense with Donte Hightower, Kyle van Nooy and Jamie Collins looks brutal, and there is no doubt that Jackson is waiting a hell of a job to avoid the "axes" of strong and moving guest linebackers.
Last week, New England decided to give up Josh "Flash" Gordon, who ended up in Seattle. Still, the good thing about Patrote is that for the first time in the season, he'll be at the top of this year's first round pick, the N'Kil Hari high receiver. He is supposed to assist the Capture Corps, with Julian Edelman, Philip Dorset and Atlanta newcomer Mohamed Sanu. The champion is the favorite. The Ravens are not expected to go out, but the host will be hard pressed to cope with the unstoppable Massachusetts team.
Also, there is a new kicker for the Baltimore New England match. Instead of fired Mike Nudent, Nick Folk got the chance. He will be replacing injured starting kicker Steven Gostkovsky in the coming weeks.



Kansas quarterback Patrick Mahoms missed his last duel with Green Bay. Andy Reed's company held up well at Erouhead, but in the finish it knelt before the onslaught of the magical Eron Rodgers and the ever-better Pekers. While there was a chance last season's MVP would return for a duel with Minnesota, recent information said he would still wait to return after a knee injury. Again, the veteran Met Moore will need to be on fire. Not playing Mahoms could take advantage of a stinging Minnesota tied four triumphs. Kirk Kazins finally justifies a fabulous $ 28 million contract per season. The Minneapolis team could also return receiver Adam Tillen, who missed last year's game against Washington with a back lodge injury. Running play works for the guests, great is Dalvin Cook, and the Chiffs defense is out of level this season.
Denver may already be turning next season. After 2-6, the chances of the playoffs are minimized. In addition, starting quarterback Joe Flaco, a Baltimore quarterback this season, is injured and will be out for five to six weeks and is likely to finish this championship. The Broncos are waiting for desperate Cleveland in their field. The Browns were much expected, but they were burnt out in desire. Quarterback Baker Mayfield, the first pick in the draft last year, is under criticism. He even left the press conference last week after a burst of media fire. Odd Beckham did not justify the confidence of the Ohio team, and it seems that head coach Freddie Kichens did not live up to the task of leading a playoff team.
One of the derbies is played in Los Angeles, where the weak Chergers await the playful Green Bay. Eron Rodgers is in top form, and the good thing for Wisconsin guests is that after over a month due to a finger injury, Devonte Adams, the favorite target of a fantastic quarterback, returns to the team.
The Pekers will feel at home in the City of Angels. At the smallest stadium in the league in Carson, with a capacity of only 27,000 seats, at least half will be on the side of Green Bay, one of the league's most popular franchises. Philip Rivers has a desperate run this season. The callers are coughing up with injuries and will have a hard time stopping Green Bay, who is at odds with new, young expert Matt Lafler. The Rangers removed their offensive coordinator last week.
Seattle is undefeated this season away, but has twice made a double-click at the once-hard-to-reach Sench Link Field. Quarterback Russell Wilson is playing great, he is one of the candidates for league MVP. Tampa Bay's mind is "picking up the soup" with the favorites, but it looks like they'll have a hard time celebrating against the Sioux. Patriots reinforcement Josh Gordon will not play for the Synoxes. The controversial receiver known for her incredible talent, as well as problems with law, opiates and depression, will wait for her debut for new teams.



Sunday's program opens at Wembley's London divisional rivals from the south of AFC Jacksonville and Houston. Both teams are chasing the playoffs. The Texans will be weakened by the neglect of defense leader Jay Watt, who underwent surgery last week and ended the season. It will be a big handicap for Houston, which plays on the principle of warm-cold. Quarterback Dashon Watson got a shot in the eye last week against Oakland. He will play in the British capital, but we will see if it will bother him to show the maximum.
In Pittsburgh, Indianapolis will be deprived of the service of the first receiver of the Wei Hilton, which is expected to have a three to four week break. The Steelers are catching the last train to the playoffs. Winning them is imperative, and they rely on excellent defense, which is the better part of the team after the injury of quarterback Ben Rotlisberger. Mason Rudolf will lead his team at Hunz Field against the Colts' good defense. Not many points are expected in this match.
Philadelphia by no means ties the win streak. After a triumph in Buffalo, Pennsylvania, wounded Chicago arrives, which will hardly repeat last season's success and placement in the playoffs. The guests will have a great motivation to take revenge on Philadelphia for defeat in the "white card" round when unlucky kicker Cody Parky hit a tripod at the last second of the match and iced Solder Field. Finally, the 2018 Superboul Champion should return seasoned receiver Deson Jackson, who has not been there since the first match of the season when he injured himself in a duel with Washington.
Carolina and Tennessee are playing a match that could decide to pursue their dream of making the playoffs. The Panthers still don't have quarterback Cam Newton, but in Charlotte he doesn't grieve for Super Kem much as his replacement Kyle Allen played great. The Nashville team also lost when replacing the quarterback and giving Ryan Tanehil a chance instead of the unconvinced Marcus Mariota.
For Washington, Buffalo will be the first starter as young quarterback Dwayne Heskins replacing experienced Casey Kinum.
